description: This Java source file defines the class 'MockLegacyDoorWindowCluster', which is a mock implementation of a legacy door/window security sensor cluster. It extends 'MockLegacySecurityCluster' and implements capabilities like Tamperable, Faultable, BatteryPowered, and Troubleable. The class manages internal states for fault, tamper, low battery, and trouble, and provides methods to toggle and set these states, as well as serialize its status.

classes.name: MockLegacyDoorWindowCluster
classes.description: A mock implementation of a legacy door/window security cluster simulating tamper, fault, battery, and trouble states.

methods.name: isFaulted
methods.description: Returns whether the device is currently faulted.

methods.name: isTampered
methods.description: Returns whether the device is currently tampered.

methods.name: setFaulted
methods.description: Sets the faulted state and logs the change.

methods.name: setTampered
methods.description: Sets the tampered state and logs the change.

methods.name: isTroubled
methods.description: Returns whether the device is troubled.

methods.name: setTroubled
methods.description: Sets the troubled state and logs the change.

methods.name: sendSerialNumberCommmand
methods.description: Placeholder for sending serial number command.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns a byte array representing the device's status, including tamper, fault, low battery, and trouble.
